speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Mark, I'm doing alright, thanks. What can I help you with?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your account with Quick Loans. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I can confirm your identity. You have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $100 today and the rest next week.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I will set up the payment for $100 today. Can you please provide your payment method?

speaker: Customer
text: I'll use my debit card, the number is 4567-8910-1112-1314.

speaker: Agent
text: Please hold on. I will need to take you through a secure process for that information.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! Thank you for your cooperation. Your payment will be processed shortly.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your help, Mark.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day!
